opening: Brace yourself, adventurer! A world of excitement and peril awaits you!

genericMsgs.missingCmd: Alas, adventurer, your command appears to be lost in the wind. Please, speak your intentions clearly.
genericMsgs.invalidCmd: Hark! That command is unknown to me.. If you're not sure what to do, just type 'help'.
genericMsgs.helpCmd: Commands: n (north), s (south), w (west), e (east), take [item], use [item], look, inventory, help, restart, quit
genericMsgs.deadend: You seem to have strayed from the path, adventurer. Examine your surroundings, perhaps there is a way forward yet.
genericMsgs.emptyInventory: Oh no, adventurer! Your satchel is as empty as a dragon's hoard after a hero's visit!
genericMsgs.noItemHere: Your eyes deceive you! There is no such item here!

Enchanted Forest.name: Enchanted Forest
Enchanted Forest.description: You find yourself in the Enchanted Forest, an oasis of calm before the storm.

Door of Destiny.name: Door of Destiny
Door of Destiny.failToEnter: Without the Enchanted Rune, the massive stone remains unmoved.
Door of Destiny.entryMsg: As you brandish the Enchanted Rune, ancient magic hums and the massive stone grudgingly parts, revealing the Door of Destiny.
Door of Destiny.description: You stand before the fabled Door of Destiny. What lies beyond?

Thief's Lair.name: Thief's Lair
Thief's Lair.warning: A menacing presence lurks in the shadows. Entering without the Torch may cost you your gold.
Thief's Lair.description: You tread lightly into the Thief's Lair, eyes alert for signs of danger.

Merchant's Den.name: Merchant's Den
Merchant's Den.entryMsg: With a soft creak, the door opens to reveal the bustling Merchant's Den.
Merchant's Den.description: You step into the Merchant's Den, a myriad of goods catching your eye.

Whispering Corridors.name: Whispering Corridors
Whispering Corridors.failToEnter: Without the Torch, the Corridors are but a wall of unending darkness.
Whispering Corridors.entryMsg: With the Torch in hand, the shadows flee, revealing the Whispering Corridors.
Whispering Corridors.description: You traverse the Whispering Corridors, the silence broken only by the soft rustle of ancient secrets.

Skeleton Queen's Crypt.name: Skeleton Queen's Crypt
Skeleton Queen's Crypt.warning: A chill wind howls from the Crypt. The Skeleton Queen awaits. Without the Ancient Blade, your fate seems sealed.
Skeleton Queen's Crypt.description: You step into the Skeleton Queen's Crypt, the echo of your steps a grim reminder of the challenge that lies ahead.
Skeleton Queen's Crypt.emptyDescription: The once dreadful Skeleton Queen's Crypt now stands quiet. The chill air has given way to a sense of solemn peace. A faint light filters through cracks in the ceiling, casting long, dancing shadows across the crypt. The stone throne, once occupied by the formidable Skeleton Queen, is now eerily empty. Her skeletal minions have faded back into the dust, leaving only the faint echoes of their clattering bones.

traders.name: Gnome Trader
traders.description: Cunning and always on the lookout for a good bargain, the Gnome Trader possesses the Torch and seeks only the shimmer of gold.

thieves.name: Shadow Rogue
thieves.description: The Shadow Rogue, ever alert and swift as the wind, has a keen eye for shiny objects.
thieves.youWin: You consume the Elixir of Deceit, cloaking yourself in shadow. The Rogue gazes right through you, unaware of your presence.
thieves.youCannotLose: The Rogue sees you but grumbles in frustration as he finds nothing worth taking.
thieves.youLose: The Rogue's eyes gleam as he spots the gold. Quicker than thought, he relieves you of your treasure.

enemies.name: Skeleton Queen
enemies.description: The Skeleton Queen, a legendary terror in these parts, commands the enemies with ruthless efficiency.
enemies.youWin: With a heroic charge, you wield the Ancient Blade and strike down the Skeleton Queen, ending her reign of terror.
enemies.youLose: Without the Ancient Blade, you stand no chance. The last thing you see is the gleam of triumph in the Skeleton Queen's hollow eyes.
